name: High Classic Block Breaker
description:
Hello everyone, thank you for visiting my game page and I'll appreciate it if I can hear your feedback.

This game has been part of my learning journey and it is my first casual game to be completed and published for the world to give it a go.

HOW TO PLAY:

In the game mechanism, you have to drag your mouse left or right in order to move your paddle left or right across the screen to prevent the ball from going through.

COLLECTABLES:

There are two types of collectables timers, RED timer, and YELLOW timer. The RED timer is for speed up the game speed and the YELLOW timer is for slowing down the game speed. 

ASSETS:

All assets[backgrounds, interactable, sound effects, and so on ] used in this game were made by my brother KENNY
